qas.question: What is the second language for most Portuguese in Guinea-Bissau?
Why is French taught in school?

answers.text: Guinea-Bissau is surrounded by French-speaking nations.

qas.question: What is Guinea-Bissau a full member of?
Who speaks both African languages and Kriol?

context: <a3_0>Most Portuguese and Mestiços<a3_0/> speak one of the African languages and <a0_0>Kriol<a0_0/> as second languages. French is also taught in schools because <a1_0>Guinea-Bissau is surrounded by French-speaking nations.<a1_0/> Guinea-Bissau is a full member of <a2_0>the Francophonie<a2_0/>.
